summary: A simple and user-friendly fitness app dashboard to track workouts, progress, and goals.

features.title: User Profile Management
features.description: Allows users to view and edit their profile information, including workout history and progress tracking.

features.title: Workout Library
features.description: Provides a library of pre-built workouts for different fitness levels and goals.

features.title: Real-time Tracking
features.description: Includes real-time tracking of user progress, including calorie burn, distance covered, and exercise completion.

features.title: Goal Setting
features.description: Allows users to set and track their fitness goals, including weight loss, muscle gain, or overall health improvement.
